Reviews.Title: “Budget friendly”
Reviews.Author: April R
Reviews.Content: I just got home from a Labor Day getaway to Daytona Beach. I really enjoyed my stay at the Grand Prix. It's not a luxury resort for sure but, it's clean and the rooms are large. The people who run this place are so friendly and helpful. I've never stayed anywhere where the hosts were so nice. The whole atmosphere was laid back and friendly. I had a couple of issues with my room ( A/C related) and Bill went quickly and corrected them. The whole pool and beach area was amazing. All in all...it was a wonderful weekend with good friends and family and whenever I go to Daytona again...Grand Prix will be my place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “"Family" Motel in Daytona Beach Shores!”
Reviews.Author: Debbie T
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Daytona Beach Shores for 20 some years now. In 1999, the motel we had been staying at was torn down to build another high rise condominium. Several family members and friends had been meeting for vacation in Daytona in the fall for years. We walked and drove the beach checking all the smaller motels. We found the Grand Prix Motel that year and have been staying there every year since 2000! We like it so much that we haven't even looked at another motel since then. We go twice a year now and always look forward to each trip. If you are looking for a small, affordable,family owned motel, right on the beach, then the Grand Prix is the the place for you! The owners, Billy and Meena, will make you feel right at home. The rooms are comfortable, clean and most have an ocean view. The kitchenette is fully equipped and perfect for a short or extended stay. The pool is clean and heated and the patio has tables, chairs,umbrellas and lounges. A few short steps from the patio and you are on one of the most beautiful white sand beaches in the world! Since it is right on the A1A, you are close to grocery stores, restaurants, shops and the famous Daytona Beach Pier. What more could you ask for? We have wonderful friends that we met at the Grand Prix, that we see every year. We wouldn't have our "Florida Family" if it wasn't for the Grand Prix. If you are looking for a big, new,impersonal beach resort then this isn't the place for you. If you are looking for a small, family run motel where you can relax and enjoy Daytona Beach Shores (and maybe make some new friends), then come and visit Billy and Meena at the Grand Prix Motel! We'll be going back, and soon...Debbie and Robert

Reviews.Title: “A great stay, at a great place!!”
Reviews.Author: Peter A
Reviews.Content: My two sons and I stayed at The Grand Prix from 7/20 to 7/23 of 2012. We had a wonderful time at a great little family friendly hotel. Our hosts, Bill and Nina, as well as the rest of their amazing staff, made our stay a relaxing and fun-fiiled event, with memories that will last a lifetime. Our room was clean, well appointed and fun to be in. The hotel is in the Daytona Shores area and is quieter than the more crowded Daytona Beach. If you are looking for a nice, clean, affordable place, that feels like home, then this is your place. It is situated on a nice clean stretch of beach, which was really a highlight to our trip, as we love swimming in the ocean. The pool was great, well maintained and very clean. We have stayed here before and we will be doing so for many years to come.

Reviews.Title: “Grand Prix Motel Is Great”
Reviews.Author: CatherineM966
Reviews.Content: When in Daytona Beach Shores we highly recommend staying at the Grand Prix Motel. Besides begin a great super clean place the Manager Billy and his wife Nina make you feel so welcome and special We had the ocean front view and it was wonderful. Their pool is always clean and sparkling. We will always go back there...Danny and Cathy Lee

Reviews.Title: “grand prix”
Reviews.Author: Paige R
Reviews.Content: Always enjoy our stay at Grand Prix. Bill and his staff are always welcoming and go above and beyond expectations. Has the charm and character you look for in a Florida motel. We are always treated like family. We will always stay at Grand Prix whenever we visit Florida. We love Grand Prix.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait for an amazing stay next week!!!”
Reviews.Author: Amy J
Reviews.Content: Our family has been staying at the Grand Prix for the last 4 years, I have been going to Daytona Beach for the past 35 years and finally find my home away for home. The owners (Bill & Nina) are always welcoming and making sure your stay is the best. All of the staff their goes out of there way to make sure you are happy and have everything you need! I always feel as I am not going on vacation but going to see our 2 family!!! This is just not another hotel but a friendship for life it is not all about the money like most are it is about friendships and a happy stay while you spend your time there. The rooms are clean and large, and meet all your needs. My kids love the balonies that overlook the ocean with a great view day and night. You are just steps from the pool and beach!!! You should try it out I think you would be hooked!!!

Reviews.Title: “Another Awesome stay at the Grand Prix”
Reviews.Author: Beth P
Reviews.Content: My family has been going to the Grand Prix Motel for 4 years and can't think of staying somewhere else. We love the fact that we are always welcomed by Bill and Nina (owners) each year will a smile on there face. We also love the freebies that they give everyday axe, shampoo, toothpaste, and wifi. The rooms are clean and air works great, pool is clean and always enjoyable. We always feel safe at the Grand Prix.. Bill is always walking around to make sure things are going well for everyone. Thanks for another great year at Daytona Beach and can't wait to go back next year!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay,Great Value”
Reviews.Author: hippie505
Reviews.Content: We had a great time at the grand prix motel. Steps away from the ocean. We have been coming to Daytona beach shores for over 20 yrs. We enjoyed are stay at the GRAND PRIX MOTEL. Bill was very friendly and helpful. We had the oceanfront room. EXCELLENT VIEW WITH A BALCONY.The housekeeping was outstanding. My husband enjoyed the freebies, toothpaste,shampoo and condtioner and axe aftershave-everyday. Not to many freebies in this world. We enjoyed the pool area. Always ice in the Ice machine. We have already booked for next year to stay longer. We are already looking forward to next year and going back to the grand prix motel. We would encourage anyone to stay here. WE LOVED IT! Thanks again Bill, The Mitchell's

Reviews.Title: “Our Stay at Grand Prix Motel”
Reviews.Author: MAMASITA34352
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the grand prix motel was awesome. Couldn't ask for a better place to stay. Great beachside view. Manager & staff were very friendly & accommodating. Didn't even have to leave the pool area because beach was right in front of us. We finally found our ideal spot in Daytona. Rooms were very clean and like I said location was great! Wish we didn't have to leave but are looking forward to our next stay.Would recommend this motel to everyone. Mr. & Mrs. Edwin Martinez

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Ed B
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay at the Grand Prix and I really enjoy this place. Bill does a great job keeping the place clean and making sure everyone is enjoying their stay. The rooms are clean and comfortable and the view of the ocean is outstanding. Nicole does a terrific job with the housekeeping and is a really sweet young lady. Very nice pool as well. No complaints as I would highly recommend anyone staying here as the value can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: chris d
Reviews.Content: great family place to stay, everything you need within walking distance,staff always willing to help. we have been coming here for the last 7 years and we like it so much that next year we will be bringing 2 more familes

Reviews.Title: “BEST MOTEL IN DAYTONA”
Reviews.Author: IVY C
Reviews.Content: Our first time in Florida togather we stayed at the Grand Prix Motel, when we pulled in Bill was so welcomeing and friendly on a Sunday morning! He put us in a room right on the ocean with a beautiful pool, nice neibors and vary reasonably priced. Our room is vary clean and with a nice little kitchenette, front and back door entrance, 2 beds and vary sweet housekeeping ladies! I felt vary safe at Bill's place as he walk's the grounds every night to make sure everyone is well and fine. We booked the room for a week and had such a wonderful time that we stayed for another! The ice machine was always full, the weather was always nice and the personable hospitality was the best!!! When we come back next year we are definatly staying here agin!

Reviews.Title: “The Perfect Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Robert M
Reviews.Content: Had the best time. Billy and his staff are always so nice and friendly. We have been staying here for over 10 years. Clean rooms, clean pool and just a short walk to the beach. What else could you ask for? A very good price :)

Reviews.Title: “Value with a million dollar view”
Reviews.Author: Caribbean D
Reviews.Content: I have been vacationing in Daytona Beach for over 30 years and I wanted to let everyone know who is thinking about this motel, should not think anymore and just get up and come here.. I am still vacationing here until tomorrow, Friday June 8, 2012, and wish we could be staying longer. I first want everyone who is coming to the beach to please not anticipate an immaculate stay. What you do get is a million dollar view of the beach, a pool that is more than adequate with enough size for many people, plenty of lounge chairs, tables w/ umbrellas, a BBQ area and clean rooms. This is an older hotel and for the true vacationers of Daytona Beach, lets just be thankful that these smaller family motels are still around instead of some over sized sticks and bricks condo that are so far over priced that most who can afford to pay it choose not too. The staff has been more than helpful with any and all needs requested, housekeeping does an excellent job in providing service in a timely manner. What you get is service, great price, a 2 story building and the kitchens, although, are smaller than your kitchen at home are functional and serve the cooking needs of anyone wanting to do so while here. The pool was clean and after reading a few reviews regarding the sand issue, if you will just walk out to the where the concrete meets the sand, you will notice the sand is building up from the beach. This takes it out of the hands of the owner of the property. The sand around the deck, which is not noticeable is blown up from the beach. Pack your suitcase, bring the family, gas prices are going down and head to Daytona. The best vacation you have not had in a long time is waiting for you here at the Grand Prix.

Reviews.Title: “weekend getaway”
Reviews.Author: Delilahpetersonwolfo
Reviews.Content: we arrived at front desk and had a friendly reception. our room was clean and had plenty space. we had our own balcony and were steps away from the beach.the pool was heated had good lighting at night. also plenty of tables and lawn chairs also has a nice bbq area. this motel is also far enough down a1a where it is quiet from the tourists attractions yet close enough to enjoy them the restoom was very clean and had plenty towels,soaps ect. there is a big ice machine for plenty of free ice the owner/mgr was extremely nice every time he saw us he called us by name and made us feel like he really appreciated our business. we usually come to daytona at least once a month for the entire summer and have enjoyed this stay the best, we will definately be back the peterson's

Reviews.Title: “Another perfect weekend”
Reviews.Author: gordondavid
Reviews.Content: Probably our 20th stay with Billy at the Gran Prix and always a nice stay. Billy has spent the last year doing some upgrades which include new carpeting, tile and paint, also the pool heater has been replaced. Great rooms, always get the one witha kitchen so we save money by eating in our room. Nice pool deck with plenty of chairs and tables and a BBQ area, easy access to the beach. The place was packed, with travelers from all over the eastern seaboard, he seems to have lots of regulars, who like us enjoy their stay. Clean, quiet and well maintained with excellent prices.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Vacation Spot!!!”
Reviews.Author: DennisHuntingtown
Reviews.Content: We have staying at this hotel several times per year for 25 years. The owner and staff are always very helpful and go out of their way to make our stay pleasurable and comfortable. Well care for with a heated pool, BBQ pit and direct oceanfront views. Centrally located to all of the Daytona Beach attractions. If you are looking for an affordable vacation location you cannot do wrong visiting the Grand Prix Motel.

Reviews.Title: “Another awesome family vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Angie51667
Reviews.Content: This was our third stay with the Grand Prix in Daytona Beach. We will be back again soon. Small and cozy, all rooms face the ocean, and family friendly. Bill and his family do an awesome job keeping up with any needs you may have. Great pool with lots of chairs, BBQ pit, nicely decorated with tropical theme. Parking at your door is also a bonus. I highly recommend to anyone wanting a nice vacation on the beach with no worries. Bill is always walking around asking how your stay is and he makes sure everyone feels at home. Can't wait for our next trip!

Reviews.AuthorLocation: East Wakefield, New Hampshire, United States
Reviews.Title: “Our favorite place on the beach!!”
Reviews.Author: loribethunelevasseur
Reviews.Content: We love staying at the Grand Prix Motel when we are in Daytona Beach each year!! Bill and his staff go out of their way to make sure your stay is most enjoyable. The friendly family atmosphere makes you feel right at home. This motel is right on the beach with beautiful views. Restaurants and shopping are all close by. We have been staying here for the past five years and have met many nice people that come and stay here each year. Looking forward to coming back again next winter!! I highly recommend choosing the Grand Prix for your next relaxing vacation in Daytona Beach!!

Reviews.Title: “Fun at the beach”
Reviews.Author: kitter
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a four day business/pleasure trip to Daytona and had a really relaxing stay at the Grand Prix. Bill, the owner was always on hand and was able to provide everything we asked for or needed. Nice guy. Also the girl who cleaned our room was a real sweetheart and could answer questions and make good recommendations about the area. The motel is older but very well kept, the pool and grounds are spotless. The proximity and views of the beach were great. We really liked staying in room #41 with the little kitchen, if you like to cook in sometimes. Overall our stay was too short but will return for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff! Nice, little hotel for a quick stay.”
Reviews.Author: unschoolermom
Reviews.Content: Maybe not the greatest "theme" for a hotel...but really who cares? It definitely fits the word "motel". We were originally placed in an upstairs room but due to an issue, we moved to a downstairs room that we liked much better...seemed cleaner and newer, though I was told the other room was freshly painted. It was me and my 3 kids....14, 12, and 7....and we were told the pool was dirty due to the high winds. There was sand in the pool due to that but we didn't think it was "dirty". My kids loved it. It was cold from the wind so the heat from the pool was nice for them. We did have an issue with the first room we were in and the manager was very understanding and immediately moved us and came with me to inspect to make sure it was satisfactory to me. He was great! I also didn't expect the free wi-fi...a nice bonus! (albeit a bit slow.)

Reviews.Title: “Great Access to Beach and Pool”
Reviews.Author: ClassicChevy57
Reviews.Content: Our family of four stayed at the Grand Prix for several years in the 1990s, and my husband and I just returned for a one-week stay, and we were once again very pleased with the accommodations. We love staying at the Grand Prix because of the access to the beach and the warm welcome by the owner. The owner is accessible at all hours and couldn't be more accommodating to our needs. Over the years he has made continuous improvements to the hotel. The young woman who cleaned our room was quick, but thorough; and again, very willing to help out with our every request. We stayed on the first floor, a few short steps from the very clean and very warm swimming pool; and the steps from the pool take you right down to the beautiful beach. There is a BBQ pit next to the pool so we were able to bring in our own food and eat right at the pool. Our room had a small kitchen with a large refrigerator, stove, and microwave, plus cooking and kitchen utensils; and there was another small refrig and microwave in the bedroom. We will always make the Grand Prix our Daytona home.

Reviews.Title: “bike week 2012”
Reviews.Author: mispay22
Reviews.Content: my boyfriend and i stayed here during bikeweek 2012 and i cant say enough how tenitive bill was to us and all the bikers... we all had a place for are trailers and he made sure we had rooms were we could park are bikes next our doors... ... bill was there for anything that he needed.the cleaning girl was great she kept are room very clean made sure we had clean towels everyday.. she even spread out my blanket everyday on the bed it was nice..... Thank you for make are trip a good one..!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “bikeweek 2012”
Reviews.Author: daveh1955
Reviews.Content: very nice and good price on room ,very friendly surounding ,very helpful owner, nice clean pool with full view of the ocean just feet away would stay there again

Reviews.Title: “I would sleep in my car next time”
Reviews.Author: Tamnpj
Reviews.Content: This by far is the worse place I have ever stayed, old and grundgy. No ammenities at all and you have to pay a deposit for your tv remote !!! The maintance man was drunk and creepy , if there was an ice machine we couldnt find it and they were putting in a new parking lot at 730 in the am with out notifing us. The air conditioner didnt work and every time we called the front desk there was no answer. Spend a little more and dont stay at the Bates motel 2.

Reviews.Title: “Mosquitoes, roaches, bad serive, Oh My!”
Reviews.Author: nicoletini81
Reviews.Content: I normally don't bother writing reviews unless something is worth my time... This past weekend was by far the worst hotel experience of my life. We first entered the room only to be greeted by numerous mosquitoes. When we returned at 1 a.m. to go to sleep there was a roach on one of the headboards and there were yellow stains on the sheets. We packed our belongings and rang the bell for the office. I told the man that we wanted to check out right then and his first response was that we wouldn't get our money back. I told him I didn't care and I just wanted to get out of there and not have to bother returning later. I wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy. Horrible place and horrible service.

Reviews.Title: “This wouldn't be my first pick next time I stay”
Reviews.Author: Kshelton64
Reviews.Content: Clean, polite staff, nice pool, on the beach, air conditioner worked well, balcony. A lot of small things that added up: no Kleenex, no complimentary shampoo, one light by bed didn't work, another light had to be plugged in and unplugged to make it work, one plug in didn't work at all, parking was horrible, no "do not disturb" sign so housekeeping came knocking when we wanted to sleep in, walkway by door was so narrow that you had to be careful that you didn't whack someone walking by when you opened the door (should have opened in instead of out), beds were full sized so I didn't even sleep with my husband (we both tend to enjoy our bed space). Expected more for $120/night (holiday rate)

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for...maybe a bit more.”
Reviews.Author: SyracuseGirl
Reviews.Content: I checked in with no reservations for 3 nights. The location was further from the main part of the daytona beach action i was looking for. But there is a grocery store, post office, liquor store, dollar general, etc. all within walking distance. The beds weren't very comfy and the pillows were flat. There was no working deadbolt on the door, which made me a bit nervous since I was by myself. But for what I paid, the place was a STEAL! You can walk right on the beach from the motel. They have a nice heated pool with a bbq pit. The employees were extremely helpful and accommodating towards me. If you really just need a place to stay that is right on the beach on you're on a budget, this is the place for you!

Reviews.Title: “Get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: briankaye
Reviews.Content: Pillows as thick as kleenex. Paint peeling off the walls. Roaring air conditioner. Friendly staff. Pool clean and warm. Cheapest motel on the ocean strip. I got exactly what I would expect to get at this price.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good people and excellent value on the beach!”
Reviews.Author: Danni414
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for Bike Week 2011. Location is beautiful right on the beach. Probably one of the cheapest places to stay directly on the beach! Great value. Room smelled mildewy but that happens in old structures esp near the water. Bring your own pillows, there's are flat like a kleenex.

Reviews.Title: “Bad place, bad attitude. Never again.”
Reviews.Author: visitor_from
Reviews.Content: First the only good thing. After lots of trouble the Wifi worked well. The rest is beyond belief. As soon as I showed up at 11:00a, tired after a long drive the owner charged me the full credit card for the 4 days and then told me that I could not have a room until 3pm. The parking lot was empty. When I came back at 3pm, even more tired there was nobody at the office nor answering the bell. After a long trip around the whole place I found somebody that got me somebody else to help me and finally give me the key. The room was as old as it gets, and the back of the hotel which you need to pass to enter the room was a real, I am not exaggerating, garbage dump. It was cold in January, and when the heating went on, the fan made a noise like a jet engine. There were too many problems to list here. I decided to leave next day, but the owner said that they had a policy of no refunds. The hotel was empty, so it's not that they had rejected other people to accommodate me. Finally, I could leave after forced to pay an extra night as penalty. Do not even think of this place unless you are as stupid as I was.

Reviews.Title: “Great beach location, but needs work”
Reviews.Author: villandrew
Reviews.Content: Location - For what you pay, the beach location was perfect, however about a 20 minute walk to central Dayton Rooms - Clean, however bedding is old and needs new covers as they are unpleasantly dirty. Staff - Always accessible and helpful Wifi - wifi only available if your room is near the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: ginger40475
Reviews.Content: I would just like to comment on this location..I have had the pleasure of staying there on numerous occasions. I have always felt as though it very much like a home away from home. You have many of the local hot spots in close proximity or if you prefer to stay in and cook or just grill out beside the pool. It is a very casual and relaxing enviroment. For families it offers an ideal place to stay close to everything but small enough to keep a close watch on the children. Where else does the owner and his family make it a point to come bye and stop to chat, just to see how your enjoying your stay. If your looking for a flashy place then keep looking, but if your looking for just a comfortable place to enjoy yourself, watch the beautiful sunrises and sunsets and kick back and relax then this is the place for you. It has been a couple of years since I been back to florida but I still receive a Christmas card every year from the Grand Prix. I highly recommend !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! We always travel as a group with family and friends that have children and we could go somewhere else but we go back because of the owners and the treatment that we have always received. Virginia/Kentucky

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean place, great service, AMAZING VIEW, good rates...”
Reviews.Author: FromSalem
Reviews.Content: PLEASE DON'T PASS THE GRAND PRIX BY!!!!!!!!!!! Yes, the Grand Prix is old. Yep, the kitchenette is vintige 50s, but THIS PLACE IS WORTH THE VISIT. My Dad, best friend, my three kids (15, 12, and 6) and I choose Grand Prix based on some mixed reviews and the PRICE. Wow, the price was unbelievable! We figured even if it was awful, we didn't plan on staying in the hotel that much. But we ended up really enjoying the place, and especially the friendly service of the staff, especially Bill. I believe he must be the owner, since he was the one we spoke to the most. The view from the back overlooking the ocean is BREATHTAKING! It was MAYBE 50 feet from my room door to the actual ocean!!! There IS wireless internet, and it worked fairly consistantly. The rooms were clean, and roomy. I really liked that there was a small heater for the bathroom, so you could warm up after swimming. The shower in my room was very roomy. We parked 10 feet from the room door. okay, so the not so great stuff... The electricity did flicker several times one morning, and Bill came around checking the rooms. The room was a little musty, but I sprayed it down with Fabreeze, and never noticed a smell again. The mattresses were VERY clean (I know because my 6 year old stripped the beds one morning to play fort) and the sheets and covers were clean and in good condition. The mattress was too firm for my liking, and the pillows were a bit flat, but I brought my own pillows anyway. The cable was SUPER, with tons and tons of channels. The micro and fridge worked fine. It is one of the few family-owned motels I have ever stayed at, where you truely felt welcomed by the staff. We hated to leave! Planning our return trip next March!

Reviews.Title: “Never again!”
Reviews.Author: 51ontario
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for just a roof over your head , then this is the place. The room we were in was dark and dreary, it badly needed a paint job and thorough cleaning, the towels were thread bare, the lounge chairs by the pool were disgustingly filthy, a group of spring breakers were partying and setting off firecrackers in the middle of the night and management did nothing, and the pool was freezing! Need I say more?

Reviews.Title: “Best Deal on the Beach!! :)”
Reviews.Author: frankandlucy
Reviews.Content: We live in Okeechobee, Florida and we stay at the Grand Prix Motel every December and March. It's a nice, clean, convenient motel at a very reasonable rate. Great restaurants are nearby and it's right on the beach! We've already booked two weeks for next December! :)

Reviews.Title: “Best kept secret in Daytona!”
Reviews.Author: chuckerst
Reviews.Content: The Grand Prix is the best kept secret in Daytona! I have been there the last two years and think it is the best deal going. The pool is clean, the rooms are clean and you can get a kitchen in a separate room that makes this stay a tremendous bargain. Located on the beach, if it's crowded on the beach you can sit at the pool and still enjoy the ocean! Yes it is an older establishment-not a high rise-but extremely quiet and relaxed-not a lot of frills, just a great place to stay at a very reasonable price!

HotelInfo.Name: Grand Prix Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 2015 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
